title: A Demon's Song
description: HunterThe day she walked through the front door, I wanted nothing more than to hate her. I didn't trust her, and she rubbed me the wrong way from the get-go.I wanted nothing to do with her, so I ensured I'd avoid her at all costs. It worked for a while, until I found her on the side of the road in the middle of the night. Of course I did the noble thing and brought her home, but I had no idea she'd end up in bed, or with me pounding into her.I told myself one night couldn't hurt. Only, it did.One night shifted everything and before I realized it, trouble came knocking on my door, and her safety hung in the balance.
author: E.C. Land
